      • respondHelp

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondHelp(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                        boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                        boolean nonEmptyScheduleExists)
        Our standard help response is a verbal and Card response text.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        nonEmptyScheduleExists - boolean True if the user already has a non-empty schedule defined.
        Returns:
        Commands the User may give to our application
